content: वर्गः [वृज्-घञ्] {@--1@} A class, division, group; company, society, tribe, collection (of similar things); न्यषेधि शेषोऽप्यनुयायिवर्गः <ls>R. 2. 4</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 7</ls>; so पौरवर्गः, नक्षत्रवर्गः &c. {@--2@} A party, side; <ls>Ku. 7. 53.</ls> {@--3@} A category. {@--4@} A class of words grouped together; as मनुष्यवर्गः, वनस्पतिवर्गः &c. {@--5@} A class of consonants in the alphabet. {@--6@} A section, chapter, division of a book. {@--7@} Particularly, a subdivision of an Adhyāya in Ṛgveda. {@--8@} The square power. {@--9@} Strength. {@--10@} Sphere, province. {@--11@} The whole class of objects of worldly existence (धर्म, अर्थ, and काम).
